name: Advanced Rename
author: Ahmad Al Haddad
description: A better and more powerful batch rename plugin for Figma. Provides a dozen of options (thanks to Sketch Renamer)
instructions: Select 2 or more layers, right click and select 'Advanced Rename', or press CTRL/CMD + SHIFT + R.

updates.notes: Rewrite plugin to utlize figmaPlugin API. Redesigned the UI, added preview feature.
